message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? This considers both our valuations.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still thinking that $13,000 is a more reasonable price for the product. I'd be willing to pay that amount, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
